data.Name: MOEV
data.Tagline: Artificial Intelligence software to manage, monitor and control Smart EV charging infrastructure
data.About:
Providing electric vehicle charging site hosts with an easy-to-use dashboard that monitors and controls electric vehicle support equipment and microgrids, and that offers artificial intelligence and machine-learning software, centered within our Cloud TM, to provide the most efficient and low-cost EV charging solutions. But that’s not all. Our system offering includes the  smart and cost-effective Quad 2.4 TM, which charges four electric vehicles at once, along with our MOCBox TM for monitoring and controlling 3rd-party chargers.

MOEV (pronounced “move”).
